word:
"We bowed before God at the commencement of the Sabbath. I 
     commenced to pray and my heart went out after God. I wept and 
     prayed and I felt the consolation of the Spirit of God. Jesus 
     seemed so precious, so very precious to me. I laid all my burdens 
     upon my Saviour and I was relieved."--Letter 7, 1876.
